banner.subtitle:
20 milliseconds to transform everything you know about blockchain.
We don't follow standards, we create them.

whatIs.title: What is Norsh?
whatIs.text:
Norsh is not just a blockchain. It is a new standard that removes the limits of Web 3.0. We have created an ecosystem that eliminates existing barriers and makes operations more efficient, transparent, and direct. With imperceptible latency, costs reduced to the essential, and no obstacles for those who develop, use, or innovate, in any environment: public, corporate, industrial, or governmental.

We believe that true progress comes from improving what already exists. “Reinvent the Wheel” does not mean changing for the sake of change, but evolving with purpose. If something works, we keep it. If it gets in the way, we replace it. We do not follow trends or dogmas, only what truly adds value.

The future of blockchains will no longer be defined by restrictions but by the opportunities we can create. That is exactly why Norsh exists, to build a new path that is secure, intelligent, structured, and free of barriers for the future.

cta.title: Blockchain for you, businesses, governments, and things
cta.text: From personal use to public and private sectors, from small operations to large corporations, Norsh adapts to what you need. Secure, scalable, and ready to connect people, institutions, and devices.

techInfo.title: Designed for Integration
techInfo.text:
Norsh is a blockchain ready for the real world, built on open standards and aligned with the best market practices. Our infrastructure enables seamless integration with existing systems, reducing complexity and development time.

With flexible APIs and an optimized architecture, you can connect applications, services, and devices without barriers. Your focus is your product. We've already solved the secure and scalable foundation.

banner.title: Hazardous Materials Control
banner.subtitle: Norsh's blockchain solution for Hazmat ensures secure and transparent tracking of hazardous materials from manufacturing to disposal. Chemicals, radioactive waste, and weapons are all recorded immutably and auditably, ensuring reliability at every stage.

whatIs.title: How It Works?
whatIs.text: Norsh Hazmat tracks and records the entire journey of hazardous materials, from creation to final disposal. Every movement is stored on the blockchain, ensuring a reliable and transparent history for industries, consumers, and authorities.
whatIs.list:
Who Uses It?
  • Industries track raw materials and ensure dangerous products are properly handled.
  • Governments and regulatory agencies monitor production, transport, and disposal to ensure compliance with laws.
  • Logistics companies and insurers verify that shipments follow safety standards.
  • Hospitals and laboratories manage biological and chemical waste with full transparency.

items.question: What types of materials can be tracked with Norsh Hazmat?
items.answer:
Norsh Hazmat can register any type of hazardous material, including:
  • Medical and biological waste (syringes, samples, contaminated materials)
  • Chemical and toxic substances (solvents, acids, flammable materials)
  • Radioactive materials (X-ray plates, nuclear waste, radiation sources)
  • Ammunition and weapons (tracking transport and final destinations)
  • Industrial and hazardous waste (heavy metals, effluents, toxic byproducts)
The system can be adapted for other types of tracking as needed.

items.question: How does the system ensure data security?
items.answer:
Hazmat uses blockchain technology to record each movement event, ensuring:
  • Immutability: Once recorded, data cannot be changed or deleted.
  • Transparency: Regulators and companies can access real-time information.
  • Cryptographic security: All records are protected against manipulation and fraud.
Access can be controlled, ensuring that only authorized users can view specific data.

items.question: Who can use Hazmat?
items.answer:
The system is flexible and can be used by:
  • Industrial and chemical companies handling hazardous products
  • Hospitals and laboratories for managing biological waste
  • Transport and logistics companies moving hazardous cargo
  • Government and regulatory agencies for oversight and auditing
  • Waste disposal and recycling companies tracking toxic waste
If your company deals with sensitive materials and needs a secure tracking solution, Hazmat is the right choice for you.

items.question: Is there a limit on the number of records?
items.answer:
No. Norsh Hazmat is designed to be infinitely scalable, allowing businesses of all sizes to register and track materials without volume restrictions.

The Norsh blockchain can process thousands of transactions per second, ensuring real-time tracking even for large industries.

items.question: How can I integrate Hazmat with my system?
items.answer:
Integration is done via REST API, allowing connection with ERPs, logistics systems, waste management platforms, and even IoT devices.

The integration process includes:
  1. Company registration on Hazmat
  2. Generating API credentials
  3. Automatically sending tracking events
Businesses can start with a simple web panel and expand integration as needed.

items.question: Does Norsh Hazmat comply with environmental and safety regulations?
items.answer:
Yes. Hazmat helps companies meet local and international regulations for tracking, disposal, and environmental safety, including:
  • Hazardous material transport regulations
  • Environmental rules for toxic waste disposal
  • Compliance policies for controlled substances
The system simplifies audits and regulatory reporting.

items.question: How can I start using Norsh Hazmat?
items.answer:
You can request a demo or create an account to test the system. For companies needing advanced integration, we provide technical support for setup and API automation.

Contact us to see how Norsh Hazmat can improve your hazardous materials management.
